name: University of Waterloo - George and Judy Woo Centre for Sight Enhancement and Low Vision Service
comment:
Supports for people who are experiencing vision loss that cannot be corrected by glasses, surgery or other medical treatments * services include vision assessments, vision aids and counselling

Services:
  • regional assessment centre for the government's Assistive Devices Program
  • eye exams and visual field testing for the Ministry of Transporation's Vision Waiver Program
  • assess eligibility and provide prescription, fitting, and training for individuals pursuing bioptic driving
serviceProvisionCode: $240 * coverage usually provided if receiving Ontario Disability Support Program and Assistance for Children with Severe Disabilities Program
